00043 ////!< readOn 
00044 //
00045 
00046 Entree& Terme_Source_Decroissance_Radioactive_P0_CoviMAC::readOn(Entree& s )
00047 {
00048   double lambda_tmp;
00049   s >> nb_groupes;
00050   Cerr << "Nombre de groupes a lire : " << nb_groupes << finl;
00051   for (int i = 0; i < nb_groupes; i++)
00052     {
00053       s >> lambda_tmp;
00054       Cerr << "lambda lu : " << lambda_tmp << finl;
00055       lambda.push_back(lambda_tmp);
00056     }
00057 
00058   return s ;
00059 }
00060 
00061 void Terme_Source_Decroissance_Radioactive_P0_CoviMAC::completer()
00062 {
00063   Source_base::completer();
00064   const int N = equation().inconnue().valeurs().line_size();
00065   if (N != nb_groupes)
00066     {
00067       Cerr << "Terme_Source_Decroissance_Radioactive_P0_CoviMAC : inconsistency between the number of radioactive decay constants ( " << nb_groupes << " ) and the number of components of the unknown of the equation ( " << N << " )" << finl;
00068       Process::exit();
00069     }
00070 }

00072 void Terme_Source_Decroissance_Radioactive_P0_CoviMAC::associer_zones(const Zone_dis& zone_dis,
00073                                                                       const Zone_Cl_dis& zone_Cl_dis)
00074 {
00075   Cerr << " Terme_Source_Decroissance_Radioactive_P0_CoviMAC::associer_zones " << finl ;
00076   la_zone_CoviMAC = ref_cast(Zone_CoviMAC, zone_dis.valeur());
00077 }
00078 
00079 void Terme_Source_Decroissance_Radioactive_P0_CoviMAC::dimensionner_blocs(matrices_t matrices, const tabs_t& semi_impl) const
00080 {
00081   const Zone_VF& zone = la_zone_CoviMAC.valeur();
00082   const DoubleTab& inco = equation().inconnue().valeurs();
00083   const int ne = zone.nb_elem(), N = inco.line_size();
00084 
00085   for (auto &&n_m : matrices) if (n_m.first == "concentration")
00086       {
00087         Matrice_Morse& mat = *n_m.second, mat2;
00088         IntTrav sten(0, 2);
00089         sten.set_smart_resize(1);
00090         for (int e = 0; e < ne; e++) for (int n = 0; n < N; n++) sten.append_line(N * e + n, N * e + n);
00091         tableau_trier_retirer_doublons(sten);
00092         Matrix_tools::allocate_morse_matrix(inco.size_totale(), equation().probleme().get_champ(n_m.first.c_str()).valeurs().size_totale(), sten, mat2);
00093         mat.nb_colonnes() ? mat += mat2 : mat = mat2;
00094       }
00095 }
00096 
00097 void Terme_Source_Decroissance_Radioactive_P0_CoviMAC::ajouter_blocs(matrices_t matrices, DoubleTab& secmem, const tabs_t& semi_impl) const
00098 {
00099   const Zone_VF& zone = la_zone_CoviMAC.valeur();
00100   const DoubleVect& pe = zone.porosite_elem(), &ve = zone.volumes();
00101   const DoubleTab& c = equation().inconnue().valeurs();
00102   Matrice_Morse *Mc = matrices.count("concentration") ? matrices.at("concentration") : NULL;
00103   const int N = c.line_size();
00104 
00105   for (int e = 0; e < zone.nb_elem(); e++) for (int l = 0; l < N; l++)
00106       {
00107         const double fac = pe(e) * ve(e) * lambda[l];
00108         secmem(e, l) -= fac * c(e, l);
00109         if (Mc) (*Mc)(N * e + l, N * e + l) += fac;
00110       }
00111 }
